t: Por favor, póngase detrás de la línea.

s: The sky is full of stars tonight.
t: El cielo está lleno de estrellas esta noche.

s: The water was perfectly still.
He threw a stone into the lake.
Go straight down this road.
The party was a total surprise.
t: La fiesta fue una sorpresa total.

s: The dog wagged its tail.
Use some tape to fix the box.
t: Usa un poco de cinta para arreglar la caja.

s: Our first task is to clean the house.
t: Nuestra primera tarea es limpiar la casa.

s: I don't like the taste of onions.
t: No me gusta el sabor de las cebollas.

s: She will teach us English.
She wiped a tear from her eye.
t: Se limpió una lágrima del ojo.

s: What's for dessert tonight?
We live on the east coast.
Life is a great adventure.
t: La vida es una gran aventura.

s: Thank you for the good advice.
Keep your balance on the ice.
t: Mantén tu equilibrio en el hielo.

s: We live in the 21st century.
The storm caused great damage.
It takes effort to succeed.
t: Se necesita esfuerzo para tener éxito.

s: He is a famous writer.
The flowers in the garden are blooming.
t: Las flores del jardín están floreciendo.

s: Health is better than wealth.
t: La salud es mejor que la riqueza.

s: He has a steady monthly income.
t: Él tiene un ingreso mensual estable.

s: Don't judge a book by its cover.
t: No juzgues un libro por su portada.

s: Knowledge is power.
The water level is rising.
t: El nivel del agua está subiendo.

s: I have a good memory for names.
t: Tengo buena memoria para los nombres.

s: We must protect mother nature.
t: Debemos proteger a la madre naturaleza.

s: The object was hidden in the box.
t: El objeto estaba escondido en la caja.

s: This is a public library.
